overview: One morning, after a night of anguish, a symptom of an unconscious revolt, a man wakes up transformed. He tries to reach his parents who knock on his door. With painful effort, he manages to open the door, but at the sight of him, frightened and disgusted by his disturbing strangeness, his parents close the door on him. Placed outside the world and desperately alone, he will have to endure the process of annihilation that is set upon him.
title: Métamorphose
